abstract: A music item that represents a playlist.
rawMarkdown:
---
source: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/MusicKit/Playlist
crawled: 2025-12-03T05:01:08Z

# Playlist

**Structure**

A music item that represents a playlist.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Playlist
```

## Structures

- **Playlist.Entry**: A music item that represents a playlist entry.

## Instance Properties

- **artwork**: The artwork for the playlist.
- **curator**: The playlist’s associated curator.
- **curatorName**: The display name for the playlist’s curator.
- **entries**: The entries in the playlist
- **featuredArtists**: A collection of featured artists for this playlist.
- **id**: The unique identifier for the playlist.
- **isChart**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the playlist represents a popularity chart.
- **kind**: The kind of playlist.
- **lastModifiedDate**: The playlist’s most recent modification date.
- **lastPlayedDate**: The date when the user last played the playlist on this device.
- **libraryAddedDate**: The date when the user added the playlist to the library.
- **moreByCurator**: A collection of additional playlists by the same curator.
- **name**: The name of the playlist.
- **playParameters**: The parameters to use to play the tracks in the playlist.
- **radioShow**: The playlist’s associated radio show.
- **shortDescription**: An abbreviated description to show inline or when the playlist appears alongside other content.
- **standardDescription**: A description to show when the playlist is prominently displayed.
- **tracks**: The tracks in the playlist.
- **url**: The URL for the playlist.

## Enumerations

- **Playlist.Kind**: The available kinds of playlists.

## Default Implementations

- **FilterableMusicItem Implementations**
- **MusicLibraryRequestable Implementations**

## Music Items

- **Album**: A music item that represents an album.
- **Artist**: A music item that represents an artist.
- **Curator**: A music item that represents a curator.
- **Genre**: A music item that represents a genre.
- **MusicVideo**: A music item that represents a music video.
- **RadioShow**: A music item that represents a radio show.
- **RecordLabel**: A music item that represents a record label.
- **Song**: A music item that represents a song.
- **Station**: A music item that represents a station.
- **Track**: A music item that represents a track.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- FilterableMusicItem
- Hashable
- Identifiable
- MusicCatalogChartRequestable
- MusicCatalogSearchable
- MusicItem
- MusicLibraryAddable
- MusicLibraryRequestable
- MusicLibrarySearchable
- MusicLibrarySectionRequestable
- MusicPersonalRecommendationItem
- MusicPlaylistAddable
- MusicPropertyContainer
- PlayableMusicItem
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
